snippet: The company took a loss in the second quarter because raw milk prices grew 31 percent compared with last year.
lead_paragraph: The company took a loss in the second quarter because raw milk prices grew 31 percent compared with last year.

headline.main: Dean Foods Loses $645,000 as Raw Milk Prices Grow
headline.print_headline: Dean Foods Loses $645,000 As Raw Milk Prices Grow
